name: OTRS Dark Mode (By Scythir)
description:
Something I threw together today because OTRS hurts so bad.
Not too professional and far from done but I'll update it as soon as I find some more time to work on it.
additional_info:
I'd still consider this alpha, created on OTRS Community Edition, not the business thingy!

INSTALLATION:
1. preferred installation via Stylus: Create a new style for your OTRS Ticket system and copypaste my code into it.
2. change the url to your ticket systems url so that the style will be applied there:

(Recommended) This will apply to everything that starts with https://example.com/otrs
@-moz-document url-prefix('https://example.com/otrs') {


-This will apply the style for everything on the domain example.com, even if you have sites there that are not OTRS (like www.example.com/email) -> use only if your OTRS has its own domain
@-moz-document domain('www.example.com') {


for documentation on this topic see: https://github.com/stylish-userstyles/stylish/wiki/Applying-styles-to-specific-sites
